name: Knock Knock by Smith & Brock
description: Knock Knock by Smith & Brock deliver quality produce and selected groceries directly to your door.  Originally, they were a wholesale business supplying restaurants and hotels in London with the freshest, most delicious ingredients. Now, you can have them delivered right to your door.  They offer veg, fruit and dairy boxes, as well as an essentils, indulgence and pasta boxes. Delivery is free on orders above £35, and on orders below £35 there is a delivery charge of £5.
safetyTips: Please enquiry directly about safety measures.
